attributes.additional_details: Women should not have to feel afraid or threatened to go out late or even alone and i think self-defence classes will help women to protect them selves from a possible attack and will help with mental wellbeing amongst other things and they should be free of charge to women or maybe even some sort of funding to help pay for classes
attributes.background: To put in place free self-defence classes for women of all ages across the UK

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Mandatory self-defence classes as part of school curriculum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578987

Fund free self-defence classes for women in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578919
